titleStmt.title: A learned astronomical discourse, of the iudgement of natiuities Deuided into three bookes, and dedicated first to Katherin the French Queene, by Oger Ferrier her physition. Translated by Thomas Kelway Gentleman.

titleStmt.author: Ferrier, Auger, 1513-1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the widdow Charlewoods house, for Richard Watkins,
